mapper.sql:
select
a.`id` as 'id', a.`return_request_id` as 'returnRequestId', a.`order_item_id` as 'orderItemId', a.`customer_id` as 'customerId', a.`num` as 'num', a.`return_reason` as 'returnReason', a.`create_time` as 'createTime', a.`status` as 'status', a.`admin_memo` as 'adminMemo',
from `t_order_return_request_item` as a
